Text:
For the English-only:  This torrent has 3 of the fake trailers from Grindhouse, in 2 mpeg files.  The 4th fake trailer, Machete, can be easily found in the copies of Planet Terror.

Thanks to Wolverine84 for posting these.

Hobo With a Shotgun isn't technically one of the trailers from Grindhouse.  It won the Grindhouse trailer contest at SXSW and was shown with some prints of the film (in Canada, if I remember correctly), but was not actually part of the film like these.
